alert.note: Alert for Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 6:43AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Hardee, Manatee, northwestern DeSoto and northern Sarasota Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 642 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Parrish to 7 miles southwest of South Bradenton. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sarasota, Bradenton, Palmetto, Lakewood Ranch, Ellenton, Sarasota Springs, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, North Sarasota, Sarasota Bradenton Airport, West Samoset, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, Myakka River State Park, The Meadows, Ridge Wood Heights, South Bradenton, Myakka City and South Sarasota. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
